data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Klautau, Michelle, Cavalcanti, Fernanda F., Borojevic, Radovan (2017): The new sponge species AmPHOriscus Pedunculatus (Porifera, Calcarea). Zootaxa 4341 (1): 105-112, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4341.1.9|5 occurrences
